Summary: Short, stationary bluish cone shaped object with shiny top
divs: sighting detailsi was in the car with my g\f when i happened to look upwards and see a cone shaped object with a silvery bulbous end (the other seemed pointed, but partially transparent)the pointed end was the 'bottom'. the object was stationary- and didn't seem to move- the 'plastic wrap cone didn't even shift. there was no wind at the time, but being it looked to be about..... 500+ feet up, there should have been a breeze at that height, even a slight one. it appeared to be a silvery balloon wrapped in transparent plastic (or even a weather balloon), but it had no motion to it. it either had a bluish green tinge, or it was refracting the color of the sky thru the plastic wrap. my reaction was "hey! that's not a plane". and the usual curiosity. i lost sight of the object because of our driving under trees, and my neck doesn't do 180's all that well. i am reporting this as an unidentified flying object, due to it was unidentifiable, it was flying, and it was an object. past that, it was not an airplane just from the shape and partial transparency of the bottom cone shape, and the silvery 'balloon' on top.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Archdale
This sighting has never been favorited.
